author: jtraglia
content: <@654267572107083777> After thinking about this some more, I would say the specifications are correct. If gossip were to accept blobs for multiple blocks per slot, it would be an easy DoS vector for nodes. This is how it works for the `beacon_block` topic too. Say a node receives block A and then block B is chosen to be canonical. That node would need to get block B some other way (eg RPC).

author: jtraglia
content: Because [`BlobSidecar`](https://jtraglia.github.io/eth-spec-viewer/#ssz_objects-BlobSidecar) contains a single commitment whereas [`DataColumnSidecar`](https://jtraglia.github.io/eth-spec-viewer/#ssz_objects-DataColumnSidecar) contains multiple.
